name: Asia Alternatives
overview:
Asia Alternatives Management LLC is a fund-of-funds for private equity investment in Asia. The Firm targets private equity fund managers in Greater China (Mainland China, Taiwan, and Hong Kong), Japan, Korea, South East Asia, Australia and India.

With its research, investment and client service infrastructure solely dedicated to Asia private equity fund investments, Asia Alternatives seeks to be the “partner of choice” for global institutional investors who desire to participate in the diverse and fast growing Asian alternative investment markets.

milestones.source_description: Asia Alternatives Announces Final Closing for Second Fund of US$950 Million
